Package.Name: Antitoxicity
Package.Author: ShuraBB
Package.Description:
**Please note that not all features are currently implimented into the modpack.**

Fashion features:
Filtering "combat commands" (Attention to the square, Need help, Attack, etc.) 
Filtering messages from commands in the chat 
Filtering the clicks on the minimap 
Filtering the display of commands on the minimap 
Configure the filter restrictions (command type, count, time delay, type of combat) 
Ability to block commands from killed allies 
Setting the flashing time of the highlighted square on the minimap 
Filtering messages in the combat chat 
Filtering the message according to the specified pattern, including using regular expressions
The ability to block the message From dead players 
Autocorrect a message for a given template
Setting the filter limits (number, time delay, type of battle) 
Setting the time of the message display and the time of its "dissolving" 
Ability to completely turn off the chat in the replicas 
Dimensionless "black list" 
Dimension list of friends 
Dynamic platoon 
message filter Customizable filter of pop-up messages in the hangar 
Customizable filter messages in the system channel, including using regular expressions 
Customizable message filter above the minimap 
Customizable message filter above the hardware panel 
About deletion of the message about the destruction of the tank: "The machine is destroyed ..."; 
Disabling the posthumous prompt panel;

by ShuraBB

The developer asks that if you like his work, please give him a positive rating on wgmods:
https://wgmods.net/search/?owner=70

Package.Name: Block minimap spam click after 3 repeats
Block dead allies from battle chat
Arty and Siege Filter (remove hint on battle start)
Package.Author: HAWG
Package.Description: This mod will remove the distracting clutter from the Arty and TD Siege Mode in battle,So you can focus on the battle.\r\n\r\nby HAWG

Package.Name: Auxilium Ingame Settings v{version}
Disable 2 Minute Warning
Package.Description: Disables the 2 minute warning before the end of the battle

Package.Name: Sixth Sense Duration (Don't use with the 6th sense category)
Package.Description: Sets the 6th sense duration in seconds.

Package.Name: Disable Sniper Shadowing
Package.Description: Disables the dimming when going into Sniper mode (ADS)

Package.Name: Disable Combat Messages (above minimap)
Package.Description: Disables the combat messages that show above the minimap.

Package.Name: Damage Indicator Timer
Package.Description: This will change how long the damage indicator stays on screen. The defualt is 5.8

Package.Name: Disable TD Break
Package.Description: Disables the TD break

Package.Name: Enable Horizonal Stabilizer on all tanks
Package.Description: Enables Hstab on all tanks.

Package.Name: Disable graphics settings window at battle start
Package.Description: Disable the window, "you can adjust the brightness and contrast settings..."

Package.Description: Adds the speed o meter to all tanks.

Package.Description: This will disable the speed o meter

Package.Name: Double press to crawl/move slow
Package.Author: lgfrbcsgo
Package.Description:
This mod allows you to crawl forwards or backwards by double pressing and holding your forwards or backwards movement key.
This is equivalent to engaging cruise control on the lowest setting, with the difference that the tank will stop once you let go of the key.


by lgfrbcsgo

Package.Name: HAWG´s Tactical Minimap
Package.Description: Hawg’s -Spg - TD - Passive Scout -Tactical Minimap’s “. Some of the top WOT Clans DONT want you to see or have this .Most good players use the minimap as a major tool in battle . So I took from these web sites “Maps Tactics” & “Guru maps” and other Discrete web sites. They show the best place to set up in Arty & Td . I mark the spots on the minimap where Arty & Td is Most Likely to set up. It shows the best strategic place for arty & td to set up ,This mod will show In Battle,So you don’t have to try to remember where to go. You can use this for “Counter Battery” or You can set up your Arty or TD in these spots. The arty icons are not to bold, just enough to see them on the minimap. This mod is great for Clan Wars !

Package.Name: HD Minimap
Package.Description: First by Locastan, updated by ShuraBB\n\nhere only the HD Minimaps, without the scripting

Package.Name: HD Minimap (black & white)
Package.Description: First by Locastan, updated by ShuraBB\n\nhere only the HD Minimaps, without the scripting

Package.Name: WOTInspector´s HD Minimap
Package.Description:
Changes minimaps to new HD maps.
All maps are created automatically.
Resolution is 2048x2048.

Images are provided by wotinspector.com

Package.Name: WOTInspector´s TECH Minimap
Package.Description:
Changes minimaps to new topographical (tech) maps.

All maps are created automatically using heights data of the maps.

Resolution 2048х2048.

Benefits of using tech maps:
- higher resolution 2048x2048
- clear display of no-go areas
- display of every bush, tree and destructible object
- altitude display by color and isolines
- every minimap is made in the same unique style because the images are generated by script

Some indestructible objects are marked as destructibles due to limitations of the game client.

Images are provided by wotinspector.com

Package.Name: Advanced (HD) Minimap (conflicts with xvm minimap)
HD Black & White Maps (as default map)

Package.Description:
Changes minimaps to new HD maps.
All maps are created automatically.
Resolution is 2048x2048.

Images are provided by wotinspector.com

Package.Name: WOTInspector´s TechMaps (as default map)
Package.Description:
Changes minimaps to new topographical (tech) maps.

All maps are created automatically using heights data of the maps.

Resolution 2048х2048.

Benefits of using tech maps:
- higher resolution 2048x2048
- clear display of no-go areas
- display of every bush, tree and destructible object
- altitude display by color and isolines
- every minimap is made in the same unique style because the images are generated by script

Some indestructible objects are marked as destructibles due to limitations of the game client.

Images are provided by wotinspector.com

Package.Name: Disable Destroyed Tanks
Package.Description: This will disable the minimap display of destroyed tanks.

Package.Name: colored arrow on minimap
Package.Description:
Added an arrow to the key target icon,
now you will see a noticeable arrow when teammates marks a target on the minimap ,
1. Version, 8 colors


by HAWG

Package.Name: Minimap Ping Spam Protector
Package.Description:
This mods allow you to control how many times a player can click on the minimap before the clicks will be ignored from your client.

Different versions inside
.

Package.Name: by CHAMPi
Package.Description:
This mod allows you to control how many times a player can click on the minimap before the clicks will be ignored from your client. 
You can also control if a click sound is played.

All options are fully customizable in a settings dialog. 
You can reach it by pressing ESC in the hangar. 



Credits:
-spoter - for the permission to use his settings mod in my mod.
-Elkano - this mod is based on his idea of a ping spam blocker.
-spion_ve, Enesian - for help with the language files.
Feel free to send me your feedback, suggestions and/or bug-reports via private message here on the forum.

Package.Name: ElkMPSB by Elkano's
Package.Description:
This modification will block minimap ping spam by enforcing certain restrictions:
Within a given timeframe (10 seconds by default) a player can only create a given number (3 by default) minimap pings to different and a single ping to an individual cell. Further pings will be noted and keep that player blocked.

 
Feel free to try it in its current state and to comment either here or on CurseForge.

Package.Name: No Ranked Badge
Package.Author: Awfultanker
Package.Description:

Ranked badges are replaced with tier info in the battle-result window.

Anchor Point: C
Switch To Default FOV: F
